website_summaries.verdict: Silky, smooth sateen weave sheet set from a reputable brand.
pros: Set includes one flat sheet, one fitted sheet, and two pillow cases
Fitted sheet has full elastic for a good fit
cons: The sheets may wrinkle when they come out of the dryer

customer_reviews.title: Teal not navy blue
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars because the color is not navy blue. Its more like a teal color. Also because they have a really terrible smell that smelled my whole room up when i took them out of the package. I have a 10" queen memory foam mattress and these sheets are huge. They do not fit tightly. I recommend purchasing these only if your mattress is 14" maybe even 12". Pros: They are soft and they domt make me sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Arrived stained
customer_reviews.text: The bottom fitted sheet arrived stained, very expensive sheets to arrive stained .
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod M Willett

customer_reviews.title: One of my best nights sleep ever finally found the Perfect Sheet !
customer_reviews.text: I am constantly trying to find that perfect sheet and I can’t believe it but this is the ONE! I woke up in the morning and could not believe how cozy and comfortable these sheets were . To start with the fitted sheet comes with extra wide elastic and a generous sized pocket to fit even the tallest mattress. The hem on the flat sheet and pillowcases feature a beautiful embroidery stitch that looks very elegant. I would have expected to pay a much higher price for such high quality sheets these are simply amazing I would highly recommend these to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable sleep !
customer_reviews.text: The size is right for a king bed, the cloth soft, very comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Argie Blue

customer_reviews.title: decent quality
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality sheets. They are not as soft as I had thought they would be, but are more like a thick linen/cotton. They wash well, but are definitely wrinkled once you get them out of the dryer. This is not a big deal to me, but if it is to you, then you may want to consider that. The material feels like quality as it is not super thin. Have had these on our bed for a week now and they are perfectly fine for sheets. I thought they may be rough with how the material feels, but they have been surprisingly great to sleep on.
customer_reviews.author: Jami

customer_reviews.title: Now That's More Like It
customer_reviews.text: What a difference thread count makes. These bright white, high quality, 400 thread count cotton sheets look really good and feel even better. They fit perfectly and the fitted sheet does not slip off my adjustable mattress when I contort it into different positions. Super comfortable and contribute to a good night's sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Bushman

customer_reviews.title: These feel so luxurious!
customer_reviews.text: These sheets feel great. If I didn't know better I would swear the thread count was even higher than 400. The deep fitted sheet fits my 16" mattress with the topper on it. I highly recommend these sheets. Great quality. And they wash like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft sheets, beautiful depth and color, very elegant.
customer_reviews.text: I love white sheets. They're a perfect, ideal bedding to look and feel beautifully clean. However, cheap white sheets are awful, and so noticeable immediately. These are not that. I'm very pleased with this set - it comes with everything expected, including pillow cases that actually fit, and a fitted sheet big enough to fit a large mattress. The weave is tight and feels good on my skin, and they look very elegant compared to the cheaper sheets we had before. Most importantly, they're comfortable to sleep in. Speaking of sleep, zzzz...
customer_reviews.author: Jason Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality; fits well
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, quality sheets (plus two pillow cases). I washed them on hot without thinking and put them in the dryer. I wouldn't do that again, but they still fit perfectly. The "deep pocket" thing is true. They're 100% cotton, 400 thread count and make a comfortable bed. I have the white, which had consistent color. Good set.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa 20

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality sheet set
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of cotton sateen. I love how the sheets feel crisp and fresh, yet still remain silky instead of coarse. This is an excellent quality sheet set. I just knocked off one star because while it does say it fits up to 18 inch mattresses, it is a bit of a tight fit. Our mattress is 16 inches, and still pulls up at times.
customer_reviews.author: NAC

customer_reviews.title: Best Sheets I've Ever Owned
customer_reviews.text: These are GREAT sheets. The only time I've ever slept on something this nice was in a hotel many years ago. The cotton feels cool and pleasant against my skin. I got the white sheets, and I couldn't be happier with them. They are classy, elegant, and feel and look great.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, well fitting sheets
customer_reviews.text: So far I love these sheets. They fit perfectly on my very thick queen mattress and feel smooth and comfortable. I haven't washed them yet - just put them right on the bed but will update my review after a couple of washes. Think they're going to be great.
customer_reviews.author: A Reader NYC

customer_reviews.title: They’re okay.
customer_reviews.text: They are just okay. Not quite as soft as expected. I’ve gotten more comfortable sheets for a third of the cost. I probably wouldn’t purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: 4foryouglencoco

product_meta.title: Nautica Home | Regatta Collection | 400 Thread Count Cotton Sateen Sheet Set, 4-Piece Bedding Set, Anti-Pilling and Breathable, Machine WashableKingWhite
product_meta.description: Add a touch of elegance and comfort to your bed with the Nautica regatta cotton luxury sheet set. This gorgeous sheet set is the perfect missing piece to any bedroom, available in white, grey, green and navy these sheets are sure to match any room décor. With their luxurious 400 thread count cotton sateen construction, these sheets are anti-pilling and feel extra soft to the touch. The fully elasticized fitted sheet has deep pockets with extra wide elastic, which prevents slipping and ensures a perfect fit on your mattress. This set fits mattresses up to 18" deep and is machine washable for easy and convenient care. Queen sheet set includes: one flat sheet (108"l x 96"w), one fitted sheet (80"l x 60"w), and two pillowcases (20"l x 30"w). King sheet set includes: one flat sheet (108"l x 114"w), one fitted sheet (80"l x 78"w), and two king pillowcases (20"l x 40"w).
feature_bullets: INCLUDES: (1) flat sheet, (1) fitted sheet, (2) pillowcases
FEATURES: 400 thread count. Constructed with soft and breathable sateen cotton. Fully elasticized fitted sheet prevents slipping from mattress and ensures a perfect fit
DIMENSIONS: Flat Sheet: 102" x 108", Fitted Sheet: 78" x 80", Pillowcases: 40" x 20"
CARE INSTRUCTIONS: Machine washable for easy care. Machine wash cold, separately. Delicate cycle. Tumble dry low. Do not bleach

specifications.Customer Reviews: 5.0 out of 5 stars1 rating5.0 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Pillow Cases, Fitted Sheet, Flat Sheet
